original_title: セカイシンフォニー Sekai Symphony 2022 Live
overview: Compiles the orchestral concert of Sega & Colorful Palette's rhythm & adventure game for iOS/Android, "Project Sekai Colorful Stage! Hatsune Miku" held on June 11 at the Pacifico Yokohama National Grand Hall for two performances, one in the daytime and the other in the evening. 25-Ji, Night Code de performs as a special guest.
title: Sekai Symphony 2022 Live
